root_causes: The script flags missing values as errors even though the question is NotRequired (optional).
Selection logic uses OR with miss(...) which selects both missing and invalid values instead of selecting only invalid non-missing values.
instructions: Do not flag missing values for this optional open numeric field. Only non-missing values should be validated against the numeric range or allowed special codes.
Replace the selection line with one that selects only non-missing but invalid values. For example: sel if ~miss(B5dx4_4) & ~((B5dx4_4 >= 0 & B5dx4_4 <= 9999) | any(B5dx4_4,97,98,99)).
Keep the allowed special codes (97, 98, 99) and the numeric range 0–9999 as in the expected logic.
